𓂧 𓊪 𓏏 𓊛 chipot ship/boat ++

𐀡-𐀴-𐀫 po-ti-ro boaters, sailors

In the hierarchy of important inventions, boats and oars are difficult to rank.

log 𓆭 𓆮 󳽷 raft * 800.000 ? Rafts using bamboo, logs or reeds Kayak (hide over wooden frame) • 11 ka Ahrensburg, Husum, northern caribou hunt Canoe Pesse 8040 BC Netherlands, Monoxylons Neolithic Egypt, Dufuna Canoe Nigeria 6000 BCE log boat ≈ dugout canoe Indians * ~ 12,000 ya ? need advanced tools, like axes, adzes and chisels plank boat 𓊠 𓊟 hull boat row boat 𒅆𒊒 ⇔ 𓐑 𓏏 𓊤 𓊥 𓊦 𓄢
mast boat 𓌳 𓊢 sail boat 𓊝 𓊡 ϣϭⲏⲣ Schoner

𒀜 ᵇad boat 𒄑𒀜 ĝeš.ad "log; plank; raft"

𒀀 𒁖 ba.dag 𑀩𑁂𑀟𑀕 beḍaga बेडक beḍaka बेड beḍa ٻِيڙِي boat 𒀀𒁖 adag ≈ ᠠᡩᠠ ada 𒄀𒀀𒁖 gi ʷa-dag "water raft" : 𒀀𒁖 AB.PAR₃ ꠜꠥꠞꠣ búra Fähre ferry
